html:
{%- if doc.individual_payment -%}
{%- for child_table_row in doc.item -%}
{%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif -%}

Revenue Money Receipt


{{doc.name}}: {{child_table_row.tenant_name}}

Date: {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date,"MM/dd/YYYY")}}




Agency {{doc.company}} Recieved from {{child_table_row.tenant_name}} Nu. {{doc.amount_received}} ({{ (frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.amount_received))[3:] }}) by Cash/Cheque/Cash Warrant/Demand Draft dated {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date,"MM/dd/YYYY")}} towards the following accounts


{%- for row in frappe.get_list(doctype="GL Entry",fields = ["account", "party_type", "party", "debit", "credit"],filters = {"voucher_no":doc.name},order_by = "-debit") -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sl.No. Account Amount(Debit) Amount(Credit)
{{ loop.index }} {{ row.account }} {{ frappe.format_value(row.debit, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}, currency=doc.currency) }} {{ frappe.format_value(row.credit, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}, currency=doc.currency) }}

Total: {{doc.amount_received}}







Name-Designation & Office Seal

(Signature)
Accounts Officer

Printed by {{ frappe.user }} on {{ frappe.utils.nowdate() }} at {{ frappe.utils.nowtime() }}
{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Page {0} of {1}").format('', '') }}

{%- endfor -%}
{% else %}
{%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif -%}

Revenue Money Receipt


{{doc.name}}: {{doc.ministry_agency}}, {{doc.dzongkhag}}

Date: {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date,"MM/dd/YYYY")}}




Agency {{doc.company}} Recieved from {{doc.ministry_agency}} Nu. {{doc.amount_received}} ({{ (frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.amount_received))[3:] }}) by Cash/Cheque/Cash Warrant/Demand Draft dated {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date,"MM/dd/YYYY")}} towards the following accounts


{%- for row in frappe.get_list(doctype="GL Entry",fields = ["account", "party_type", "party", "debit", "credit"],filters = {"voucher_no":doc.name},order_by = "-debit") -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sl.No. Account Amount(Debit) Amount(Credit)
{{ loop.index }} {{ row.account }} {{ frappe.format_value(row.debit, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}, currency=doc.currency) }} {{ frappe.format_value(row.credit, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}, currency=doc.currency) }}

Total: {{doc.amount_received}}











Name-Designation & Office Seal

(Signature)
Accounts Officer



Printed by {{ frappe.user }} on {{ frappe.utils.nowdate() }} at {{ frappe.utils.nowtime() }}
{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Page {0} of {1}").format('', '') }}

{%- endif-%}
name: Money Receipts(RP)
